data.title: Bhagavad Gita Notes From Swami Velkudi Krishna's Discourses in BG On Podhigai TV PDF
data.meta_description: Bhagavad Gita Notes from Swami Velkudi Krishna's discourses in BG on Podhigai TV.pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides a summary of key ideas from the Bhagavad Gita based on discourses by Swami Velkudi Krishna. It notes that the Gita explains the supreme goal is to reach Lord Narayana through bhakti yoga while still performing one's duties. It discusses the three gunas or qualities - sattva, rajas, and tamas - that exist within all people and how the Gita guides one to overcome rajasic and tamasic tendencies through devotion to Krishna. The summary also provides context on commentaries written on the Gita and analyzes the first chapter which depicts Arjuna's agony on the battlefield.
data.text: Bhagavad Gita Notes From Swami Velkudi Krishna's Discourses in BG On Podhigai TV PDF
